attributes.name: Static Tundra Group Activity

cases.name: Static Tundra C2 IP Detected
cases.query: source:(paloalto OR opsec OR cisco_asa OR stream) (@network.source.ip:(185.141.24.222 OR 185.82.202.34 OR 185.141.24.28 OR 185.82.200.181) OR @network.destination.ip:(185.141.24.222 OR 185.82.202.34 OR 185.141.24.28 OR 185.82.200.181))

cases.name: Potential Inbound TFTP for Config Exfil
cases.query: source:(paloalto OR opsec OR cisco_asa OR stream) @network.transport:udp @network.destination.port:69

cases.name: GRE Tunnel Established for Traffic Collection
cases.query: source:(paloalto OR opsec OR cisco_asa OR stream) @network.protocol:gre

cases.name: Local TFTP Server Enabled for Config Exfil

attributes.message: Potential Static Tundra activity detected: {distinct_count} technique(s) on host {@host} by user {@user.name}. Techniques: {case_names}. Source: {@network.source.ip}, Destination: {@network.destination.ip}, Command: {@command}
